NotificationConfigurationArn.description:
ARN identifier of the NotificationConfiguration.
Example: arn:aws:notifications::123456789012:configuration/a01jes88qxwkbj05xv9c967pgm1
NotificationConfigurationArn.markdownDescription:
ARN identifier of the NotificationConfiguration.
Example: arn:aws:notifications::123456789012:configuration/a01jes88qxwkbj05xv9c967pgm1

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^arn:aws:notifications::[0-9]{12}:configuration\/[a-z0-9]{27}$  
Update requires: Replacement

OrganizationalUnitId.description: The ID of the organizational unit.
OrganizationalUnitId.markdownDescription:
The ID of the organizational unit.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^(r-[0-9a-z]{4,32})|(ou-[0-9a-z]{4,32}-[a-z0-9]{8,32})$  
Update requires: Replacement

NotificationConfigurationArn.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^arn:aws:notifications::[0-9]{12}:configuration\/[a-z0-9]{27}$  
Update requires: No interruption
